member.name: N:RabbitMQ.Client
member.summary: Main public API to the RabbitMQ .NET AMQP client library.

member.name: N:RabbitMQ.Client.Apigen.Attributes
member.summary: Internal. Attributes used during implementation autogeneration from the AMQP XML specification files.

member.name: N:RabbitMQ.Client.Framing.Impl.v0_8
member.summary: Internal. Implementation code specific to AMQP version 0-8.

member.name: N:RabbitMQ.Client.Framing.Impl.v0_8qpid
member.summary: Internal. Implementation code specific to AMQP version 0-8, as modified by QPid.

member.name: N:RabbitMQ.Client.Framing.Impl.v0_9
member.summary: Internal. Implementation code specific to AMQP version 0-9.

member.name: N:RabbitMQ.Client.Framing.v0_8
member.summary: Semi-public. Interfaces specific to AMQP version 0-8.

member.name: N:RabbitMQ.Client.Framing.v0_8qpid
member.summary: Semi-public. Interfaces specific to AMQP version 0-8, as modified by QPid.

member.name: N:RabbitMQ.Client.Framing.v0_9
member.summary: Semi-public. Interfaces specific to AMQP version 0-9.

member.name: N:RabbitMQ.Client.Impl
member.summary: Internal. AMQP client library implementation code. These interfaces and classes are not public APIs, and may change from release to release of the library.

member.name: N:RabbitMQ.Client.Content
member.summary: Public API for construction and analysis of messages that are binary-compatible with messages produced and consumed by QPid's JMS compatibility layer.

member.name: N:RabbitMQ.Client.Events
member.summary: Public API for various events and event handlers that are part of the AMQP client library.

member.name: N:RabbitMQ.Client.Exceptions
member.summary: Public API for exceptions visible to the user of the AMQP client library.

member.name: N:RabbitMQ.Client.MessagePatterns
member.summary: Public API for high-level helper classes and interface for common ways of using the AMQP client library.
